name: St. Margaret of Hungary

locations.description: Dominican nun in Hungary, daughter of King Béla IV, known for her extreme penances

summary: Margaret of Hungary was a Dominican nun and princess, daughter of King Béla IV of Hungary. Despite her royal birth, she chose a life of extreme penance and prayer in the convent. She is known for her humility, charity, and devotion to the poor. She is venerated as a saint in Hungary.
